title: A greener prescription: the power of natural organic materials in healthcare
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Natural organic materials (NM), which are biodegradable, biocompatible, renewable, and electroactive, offer a sustainable solution to technological progress's impact on the environment. This perspective places particular emphasis on NM’s potential...
